generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Minecraft Compostable Misc
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Specifies that an item is compostable and provides the chance of creating a composting layer in the composter

fields.title: Composting Chance
fields.description: The chance of this item to create a layer upon composting with the composter. Valid value range is 1 - 100 inclusive
